plot: 6 people meet each other by chance on the same night in the same church. All of them have a secret about something they have witnessed but only gradually do they discover that.
title: Kirken
plot_es: 6 people meet each other by chance on the same night in the same church. All of them have a secret about something they have witnessed but only gradually do they discover that.
